author: nlebas
msg: TREQ-11: Adding Mustache support to Tiles

author: jwross
msg: ARIES-825: Update subsystems to latest Subsystem, Resolver, and Repository APIs.
Initial support for Require-Bundle header in applications.

author: dkulp
msg: Bunch of updates to make the site generation faster and better:
1) Multithread when doing multiple spaces (CXF + CXF20DOC)
3) Handle {children} tags so an added or delete page will automatically update pages that use the {children} tag for contents
4) Experimental support for {include:Page}.  Will flush out when I start working on Camel's site.

author: tn
msg: added javadoc, added gabow algo to scc benchmark, removed obsolete Kosaraju visit handler

author: veithen
msg: AXIOM-412: Restrict access to ChildNode#parentNode so that we can easily change the way the parent node is stored.
